author: dnash86
body:
This code has been used by us in SLHC releases, we're sending it for a PR in SLHCDEV.  It is the functional equivalent of the code sent to 80X, here:  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/12796

It was tested in SLHCDEV with the following runTheMatrix.py commands:

runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 13000, 13028, 13039, 13056, 13063

Let me know if further test are needed, and any code comments of course.  Thanks.
title: ME0 in STA muon reco for SLHCDEV
